attributes.action: Government To Pay For Truck Licenses for people claiming jobseekers benefits.
attributes.additional_details: We are in crisis paying for the hgv license will open up 10,000s of jobs for people unable to afford the cost of the license or people on job seekers allowance
attributes.background: Pay for people claiming Jobseeker’s Allowance or for people that can’t afford having license so they can ease hgv CRISIS

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. There is no charge for an application for a provisional licence.  

https://www.gov.uk/become-lorry-bus-driver/fees

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do, such as paying people to train or offering free testing.
